script.title: expand-interface-port-range.slax
script.author: rsankar
script.synopsis: Expand the interface port range for VLAN configuration across multiple groups
script.description: Use this op-script to expand the set command and use "load set" command to configure it. User can save the output and use "load set" to configure the interface. The limitation with this script is only one range can be given per execution. For multiple range we have to call the script multiple times.

example.title: Sample Output
example.description: This Op script is used to expand the interface port range
